channel.title: Cant Get Client To Work On Ubuntu
channel.description:
ive searched these forums and found something as the same question but the things did not work when i run the .sh file i have i get an error
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/rscdaemon/client/mudclient Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:217) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:205) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:321) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:294) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:266) Could not find the main class: org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient. Program will exit. [/code]

item.title: Cant Get Client To Work On Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:2, topic:356876”]paste the results of:

pwd && cat run.sh && ls[/quote]
I got him fixed up,

Read full topic
